import itertools

__all__ = ['split_generator',
           'exceptor']



[docs]def split_generator(iterable, size):

    data = iter(iterable)
    item = list(itertools.islice(data, size))

    while item:
        yield item
        item = list(itertools.islice(data, size))




[docs]def exceptor(x, exceptlist):
    
    res = [member for member in x if member not in exceptlist]
    
    return res
